alert.note: Alert for Brantley; Inland Camden; Inland Glynn; Northeastern Charlton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 2:45PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Camden, west central Glynn and eastern Brantley Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 244 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Waverly, or 13 miles west of Dock Junction, moving west at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Waverly, Waynesville, Thalmann and Atkinson. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Brantley; Inland Camden; Inland Glynn; Northeastern Charlton
